Package heartbeat

Contains all the components required to manage heartbeat. A heartbeat is a continuous ping-pong between the master and the worker. Every worker is a heartbeat server that must respond to the request within a duration. Components in this package must maintain heartbeat between the processes (liveliness) and notify interested parties in case of changes in heartbeat. IHeartBeatManager is the primary interface for this package.
Author:
somilgupta
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHeartBeatManager
    Interface for component managing heartbeat.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HeartbeatClientRunnable
    Heartbeat Client connection logic to be used for generating master-side thread per worker.
    HeartbeatManager
    Implementation of IHeartBeatManager.
    HeartbeatServerRunnable
    Heartbeat Server connection logic to be used for generating worker-side thread.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IHeartBeatManager.Mode
    Used by the implementation to identify the mode it is to work in and corresponding business logic (Runnable) to implement.
